GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves up the article matching the requested id

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles. Defaults to sorting by date descending

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments. Defaults to sorting by date descending

comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Posts a new comment to an article and returns the created comment data

exampleRequest.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!

comment.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comment.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates the articles vote count by the amount sent

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes the comment with the given comment_id
